recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle salt to fillets and fry them on both sides in butter or in oil.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Cut the garlic cloves to half and cut the lemon to big sections. Add lemon juice and mineral water to the pan.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Let simmer for 15 minutes. Then add creme fresh and bring to a boil. Season with honey and black pepper.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Put the rocket to the oven tray.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Cut the zucchini, paprika and onions to big slices. Put them to the oven tray.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle oil to vegetables and season with salt and pepper. Add the rest of the ingredients to the oven tray (salad cheese without water).

recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
recipeInstructions.text: Bake in oven at 225 Â°C for 20 minutes.
